name: Fine Motion (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Fine Motion (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.7~0.9

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • fine motion \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • white gloves, white footwear, black skirt, white jacket, green shirt, long sleeves, white coat, open clothes, collared shirt, socks, high heel boots

    • Wedding costume :

      • official alternate costume, tiara, jewelry, wedding dress, necklace, veil, green flower, bracelet, white dress

    • Tracen school uniform :

      • tracen school uniform, purple shirt, white skirt, puffy short sleeves, sailor collar, bowtie, pleated skirt, sailor shirt, miniskirt, zettai ryouiki, white thighhighs

    • Casual clothes:

      • green skirt, belt, casual, white shirt

      • (optional) noodles, holding chopsticks, food, ramen, bowl, table

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 112 images of fine motion

    • 4x low quality 35 images

    • 8x medium quality 37 images

    • 16x high quality 40 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1076 images

  • replaced character feature tags with fine motion \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, green eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 6 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
